name: Ribbon Runner
description:
My submission for the Tri-Jam!  A game made in 3 hours in which you must move side to side to land on the Ribbon matching your colour

3 difficulty settings, faster, FASTER, F-A-S-T-E-R to line up with the theme

(Check out the youtube link for a 3 hour time lapse of my development of the game)

Music by JDB Artist : https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/318

(Made tiny update just after submission updating difficulty names to match theme, I read it wrong initially)
